abstract.p: Weekly listing of residential home sales; graphs; photos (L)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$900,000 121 West 20th Street (Chelsea 121) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,656-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; part-time doormen, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 18-ft. ceilings, small balcony, gas fireplace, walk-in closet, whirlpool, c/a; common charge $6,120; listed at $900,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$1.125 million 415 East 54th Street (St. James Tower) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,900-sq.-ft. postwar condo; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, 3 exposures, health club in building; common charge $1,454; taxes $9,960; listed at $1.15 million, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$933,333 11 Fifth Avenue (Eighth Street) (Brevoort) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, windowed kitchen, parquet floors, high floor, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,256, 45% tax-deductible; listed at $950,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Marilyn Weigner Associates)

$995,000 5 Riverside Drive (72nd Street) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, windowed kitchen, decorative fireplace, high ceilings, h/w floors, Hudson River view; maintenance $1,484, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $995,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Susan D. Fine Enterprises; Douglas Elliman)

$1.61 million 12 West 96th Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, attended elevator, den, washer/ dryer in unit, common roof deck; maintenance $1,620, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $1.35 million (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Bellmarc; Halstead Property Co.)

$53,000 3555 Kings College Place 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, dining area, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $535, includes gas and electricity, 15% tax-deductible; listed at $58,000, 1 1/2 years on market (Broker: Jeskell)

$147,000 3750 Hudson Manor Terrace 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, parquet floors, east exposure; maintenance $682, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $155,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: McDonagh Properties)

$330,000 581 East Fourth Street 3-family, 80-year-old detached house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in two units; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,930; listed at $359,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Homes 'R' Beautiful)

$425,000 125 Prospect Park West 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,120-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, dining room, renovated kitchen, Prospect Park view; maintenance $667, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $444,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$355,000 34 Plaza Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, windowed kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, 2 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $722, 30% tax-deductible; listed at $375,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$337,500 72-02 Loubet Street 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 70-year-old detached frame house; dining room, h/ w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 27-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,950; listed at $360,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage F.H. Realty)

$327,500 62-31 Alderton Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 55-year-old attached brick Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, finished basement, 20-by-145-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $349,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Kingdom)

$280,000 218 Abingdon Avenue 2-family, 35-year-old high ranch; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen with skylight in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; 1-car garage, 40-by-110-ft. lot; taxes $1,828; listed at $319,900, 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$925,000 60 West Butterwood Road 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 19-year-old contemporary; sun room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, deck, exercise room, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $17,575; listed at $899,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Coldwell Banker Ye Village)

$999,999 78 Croton Avenue 7-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 91-year-old Tudor; 4 fireplaces, sun porch, 2-bedroom carriage house, barn, pool, cabana, gardens, fish pond; 1.6-acre lot; taxes $11,036; listed at $995,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Preferred Realty; Randolph Properties)

$1.06 million 4 Autumn Road 4-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, 14-year-old contemporary colonial; library, family room, 2 fireplaces, wet bar, guest room, office, pool, 4-car garage, 3 1/2-acre lot; taxes $17,131; listed at $1,085,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Ginnel)

$1.15 million 2 Old Stone Bridge Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 22-year-old house; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, den, family room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, terrace, spa and waterfall, whirlpool bath in master bath, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $9,851; listed at $1.375 million, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Pitt)

$330,000 5 Christianna Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 23-year-old colonial; dining room, family room with wet bar, floor to ceiling brick fireplace, h/w floor, new roof, central vacuum, 2-car garage, 1.01-acre lot; taxes $4,708; listed at $330,000, 53 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; DeWolfe Real Estate)

$885,000 26 Hampton Drive 4-bedroom, 4 full- and 2 half-bath, 2-year-old colonial; marble foyer, dining room, master bedroom suite with fireplace and marble bath; 2.24-acre lot; taxes to be determined; listed at $899,000, 2 years on market (Broker: Press/Cuozzo)
$260,000 154 Hughes Place 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 58-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, family room, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,200; listed at $289,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Atanas)

$875,000 1 Hemlock Drive 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 55-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 5 fireplaces, 2.3-acre lot; taxes $14,900; listed at $950,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman-Jane Hayes)

$1.15 million 2154 Ironwood Road 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 2-year-old contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 2 fireplaces, c/a, 2-car garage, 2.04-acre lot; taxes $13,000; listed at $1.3 million, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Executive Group; ERA Gatewood)

$915,000 19 Locust Place 7-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 107-year-old Victorian; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 3 fireplaces, porch, stained-glass windows, 0.42-acre lot; taxes $5,800; listed at $945,000, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Douglas Elliman-Jane Hayes; Nancy Scacola)

$200,000 232 Seventh Street 5-bedroom, 1-bath, more than 50-year-old brownstone; eat-in kitchen, full basement, 13-by-66-ft. lot; taxes $5,200; listed at $205,000, 3 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$245,000 255 Graphic Boulevard 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 55-year-old colonial; family room, c/a, full finished basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,223; listed at $245,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Gold Star Realty)

$530,000 21 Tamari Court 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2-year-old colonial; family room, den, deck, 3-car garage, 1.12-acre lot; taxes $10,287; listed at $629,900, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
